hero.name: Moayyad Alsharbji
hero.description: Front-End Developer with over 2 years of experience and strong background in algorithms and mathematics. Specialized in React.js, Next.js and efficient UI building.

aboutUs.educationDescription: Bachelor's in Information Technology at Damascus University, with a focus on foundational computing concepts, software development, and programming.

1.title: Damascus University
1.content: Studied Information Technology. Focused on web technologies, programming, and software engineering principles.

2.title: Professional Experience
2.content: Practical knowledge built through hands-on experience in developing dashboards, ecommerce apps, and real-time chat systems.

3.title: Competitive Programming Background
3.content: Strong base in algorithms and mathematics from previous participation in competitive programming.

lookingFor.title: Seeking Front-End Developer Opportunities
lookingFor.content: I’m passionate about creating responsive, user-friendly applications. Actively looking for frontend or full stack roles where I can contribute React/Next.js skills in dynamic teams.

skill.label: What is your best skill?
skill.content: Strongest in React, Next.js, Zustand, TypeScript, Redux, and building scalable UI components. Comfortable with Git, Firebase, Ant Design, MUI, and integrating real-time features using Socket.io.

careerBackground.label: Can you provide an overview of your career background as a Front-End Developer
careerBackground.content: Over 2 years of experience in front-end development, including working remotely and in-office. Projects ranged from ecommerce to AI dashboards.

educationalBackground.label: What is your educational background?
educationalBackground.content: Bachelor of Information Technology at Damascus University.

remoteWork.label: Are you open to remote work
remoteWork.content: Yes, I’ve worked remotely on multiple projects and enjoy collaborating across time zones.

projects.label: Can you share details about some of the projects you worked on as a Front-End Developer?
content: Built admin dashboard at Smarttik with real-time analytics and user management.
Created AI-powered chat dashboard for Qdeep.
Worked on ecommerce dashboards with filtering, checkout, and mobile responsiveness.
Built game app features including purchasing coins.
Maintained projects via Git and deployed to cPanel.
